ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 257
ygData.msgSnippet: Another cheap way to get out of this is to cast a low level dot on your self, and then cast mez at will! Your dot will wake you up in a sec or two, no sweat =)
ygData.messageBody:
Another cheap way to get out of this is to cast a low
level dot on your self, and then cast mez at will!
Your dot will wake you up in a sec or two, no sweat =)

--- srutkowski@... wrote:
>
> Bah, cast it, whack on your buddies to wake them up,
> then contiune the
> fight. Or, cast it, debuff and entrall/entrance the
> MOBs, then wake up
> your party =P That was you don't have to tell them
> to stop breaking your
> messes!!!
> <grins evily>
>
>
> Previous Post:\
> > From: Andrew Collins <ACollins@...>
> >
> > Mesmerization is a great spell for lower levels,
> at higher levels IMO it
> is
> > much better to use entrance. On a usual pull of
> 1-4 mobs you can
> entrance,
>
>
> I must admit I'm jealous... mesmerization is
> completely useless on rallos
> zek.
>
> Cogg
>
